thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: Dick Stutsman
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Dick Stutsman

author: Dick Stutsman
title: Dick Stutsman
text: This was my fifth order with Matboard and More. I am 100% pleased with the quality and customer service. They gave me the ability to change the order after placing it if I found an immediate error, told me when it shipped and when it was to arrive. I am very happy.
